package.name: llh_gnss_driver
package.description: Drivers processing gps data coming in the llh format into a position message in the utm coordinate system.
package.author: Martin Pecka
Adam Herold
package.build_depends:
message_generation
message_runtime
rospy http_relay geometry_msgs nav_msgs cras_py_common sound_play message_filters roscpp roslib sensor_msgs tf2 tf2_ros
